solution_line_template: Eddie bakes {eddie_pies_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{eddie_pies_per_day}*{num_days}={eddie_total_pies}>>{eddie_total_pies} pies for {num_days} days.
His sister bakes {sister_pies_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{sister_pies_per_day}*{num_days}={sister_total_pies}>>{sister_total_pies} pies for {num_days} days.
His mother can bake {mother_pies_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{mother_pies_per_day}*{num_days}={mother_total_pies}>>{mother_total_pies} pies for {num_days} days.

Therefore, they are able to bake {eddie_total_pies} + {sister_total_pies} + {mother_total_pies} = <<{eddie_total_pies}+{sister_total_pies}+{mother_total_pies}={total_pies_all}>>{total_pies_all} pies in {num_days} days.
